publication.title: Social interaction around a rural community photo display
publication.jconf: International Journal of Human-computer Studies / International Journal of Man-machine Studies
publication.keyword: Digital Photography;Public Display;Rural Community;Situated Display;Social Interaction;
publication.abstract: Public displays of photographs are a common sight in community spaces, yet while much attention has been given recently to the use of digital photography in the home, the community domain remains underexplored. We describe the Wray Photo Display, a public situated display for community-generated photography in an English rural village, which aims to understand the community's use of photos
